list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a horizontal plane or line with respect to the distance above or below a given point.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the front garden is on a level with this floor
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khu vườn phía trước nằm ở tầng lớp với tầng này

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a position on a real or imaginary scale of amount, quantity, extent, or quality.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một mức độ thất nghiệp cao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in a video game) each of a series of stages of increasing difficulty through which a player may progress, completing one stage in order to reach the next.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I've now reached level 106 on Candy Crush Saga
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bây giờ tôi đã đến cấp 106 trên Candy Crush Saga

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device consisting of a sealed glass tube partially filled with alcohol or other liquid, containing an air bubble whose position reveals whether a surface is perfectly level or plumb.
having a flat and even surface without slopes or bumps.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã đạt đến mặt đất cấp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: at the same height as someone or something else.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his eyes were level with hers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đôi mắt của anh ấy ở mức độ với cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having the same relative position; not in front of or behind.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: “Adrian,” she said in her most level voice
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: "Adrian," cô nói với giọng nói cấp độ nhất của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give a flat and even surface to.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: contractors started leveling the ground for the new power station
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các nhà thầu bắt đầu san bằng mặt đất cho nhà máy điện mới

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he leveled a long-barreled pistol at us
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông san bằng một khẩu súng lục dài hạn tại Mỹ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: ascertain differences in the height of (land).
